data.persona: I'm a fisherman. I been fishing all my life. I provide fish to the royal family. Fishing is all I know. I love the ocean.
data.description:
You are in the pier walkway.
On the seashore facing the pier, seagulls squawk as they swirl overhead. The smell of salt fills the air, and the gentle, dull roar of the waves lapping the beach is omnipresent. A gentle breeze blows, and the chatter of the villagers fishing drifts down to the shoreline from the pier.
The seagull is here.

You are carrying a weights, a broken fishing pole, a rag, a pouch, and a coin pouch, and wearing a shirt and a cloth.

data.short_motivation: I want to get fish from the seagulls.
data.mid_motivation: The seagulls off this particular pier have magical powers; I want to exchange goods to them in exchange for fish and other supplies.
data.long_motivation: If my bartering helps the seagulls to a significant enough degree, I hope to request their help in fixing my broken fishing rod.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear my fisherman's work-clothes as I start my day.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the pier with my fishing equipment.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a rag from my pouch.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get a few freshly-caught fish from the seagull.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the royal kitchen to deliver the royal family's fish portion for the week.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: eat the fish I have obtained for myself, sharing it with my family.
